title: Georgia Tech Partners to Launch MARTA Reach Pilot Program Across Atlanta | News Center - Georgia Tech News Center
content: Georgia Tech Partners to Launch MARTA Reach Pilot Program Across Atlanta | News Center  Georgia Tech News Center
description: Great solutions often start with a simple idea. For Georgia Tech industrial engineering professor Pascal Van Hentenryck, it started four years ago: an idea to tackle one of the biggest challenges for America’s eight largest rapid transit systems. “One of the big issues is connecting to and from the system. First and last mile,” Van Hentenryck said.
